name: Rhythm Painter VR
description:
Rhythm Painter VR - for oculus quest 2 - Arcade game

Music from incomptech

One track (end of the century) from DDR  PS2 soundtrack

Using the paintbrushes to hit the coloured circles and complete the song to the beat. 

The yellow  - for the purple circle.

The  purple - for the yellow circle.

This was created for the VR Super Jam 2021 and the theme was oppsites but did not get finished on time. I thought I was take some more time and upload the game anyway.
